attributes.action: Scrap the proposed council tax revaluation and intrusion into already overtaxed peoples lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is not acceptable to have another army of people intruding into our lives and penalising people for trying to improve their homes

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap the proposed council tax revaluation and intrusion into already overtaxed peoples lives."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12226.asp

Prime Minister's Office
